PyMolecule Library
==================

.. glossary::

   :any:`Molecule`
      The main class of PyMolecule. Loads, saves, and manupulates molecuar models. The main pymolecule
      contains wrapper functions for subclasses.
   :any:`FileIO`
      Subclass of Molecule. Handles input & output of files.
   :any:`Geometry`
      Subclass of Molecule. Contains geometric functions.
   :any:`Information`
      Subclass of Molecule. Contains information about the molecule.
   :any:`Manipulation`
      Subclass of Molecule. Handles manipulations of molecular information.
   :any:`OtherMolecules`
      Subclass of Molecule. Contains functions for dealing with multiple Molecule objects.
   :any:`Quaternion`
      Class handles quaternion artithmatic.
   :any:`Selections`
      Subclass of Molecule. Handles selecting subsections of the molecule object.
